page.title: 14Event (Harold Courts School)
page.content: In June 1982 the 'Friends of Harold Court School' Association decided to build a school library.The Association had to raise all the money as the Authority were unable to help.The eventual cost was Â£9,300.Nearly Â£6,700 was raised from school events.The rest was donated. In June 1983 plans were drawn and by July 1983 building permission was granted.On March 10th 1984 the building work began.To keep costs down most of the work was done by parent volunteers and staff who gave up their weekends. By April 1985 the library was finished complete with carpet,gas fires,books and lighting.The Mayor of Havering opened it officially in May.A celebration was held next day when teachers and pupils dressed as book characters.
